power.title: Binding Aegis
power.fluff: Your enemy is held fast by invisible magic bonds, and if it manages to escape your retribution will be swift

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature marked by your arcane aegis

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is held fast (save ends). The effect immediately ends if the target is no longed marked by your arcane aegis.

While it is held, the target is immobilized and immune to being pulled, pushed or slid. It must succeed on a saving throw to willingly teleport. You can use a free interrupt to temporarily suppress the immunity to forced movement.

section.name: Aftereffect:
section.text: You can use a free reaction to teleport up to 10 squares to a space adjacent to the target, and use a melee at-will attack power against it.

power.title: Blade of Judgement
power.fluff: You pour arcane energy into improving your aegis

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 5 is hit by an enemy you have marked

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport the target to a space adjacent to you.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Reflex
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

section.name: Miss (AC):
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Hit (Reflex):
section.text: The target takes ongoing 5 lightning damage (save ends).

power.title: Burning Blade
power.fluff: Your fiery blade lunges toward your enemy, and its arcane warmth flares again and again in the wounds of your foes

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target takes ongoing 5 fire damage (save ends).

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Half damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter, your Weapon attacks with the weapon you used for this attack are fiery.
While your attacks are fiery, they deal additional fire damage equal to your Strength modifier. This increases to 2 + your Strength modifier with attacks that already deal fire damage.
If an attack you make does not have the Fire keyword, it gains it.
If the attack deals untyped damage or causes untyped ongoing damage, the damage becomes fire damage.
If an attack you make already has a damage type, the type becomes fire in addition to the type(s) it already has.
